revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.2.6)
revision.text: {{talkheader}} {{WikiProject Firearms|class=start|importance=low}} {{WikiProject Military History|class=start|B1=n|B2=n|B3=y|B4=y|B5=y|Weaponry=yes}} == Picture == I know there are pictures of this, so can anyone put one on here? It's a slick looking rifle. —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:Pickledawg|Pickledawg]] ([[User talk:Pickledawg|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/Pickledawg|contribs]]) 17:18, 17 May 2009 (UTC) :Done!--[[User:Amendola90|Amendola90]] ([[User talk:Amendola90|talk]]) 12:23, 20 May 2010 (UTC) ==Picture caption== The picture shows two snipers from the Spanish Marine Brigade (BRIMAR). They belong to the 2th Landing Battalion's Recon Platoon (SERECO, BD II). They were covering a boarding party formed by fellow marines from the Special Operations Unit (Unidad de Operaciones Especiales, UOE). I —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/83.44.139.14|83.44.139.14]] ([[User talk:83.44.139.14|talk]]) 05:39, 17 April 2011 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:4|one external link|4 external links}} on [[Barrett M95]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=746460710 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20120616205221/http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/4373/108374267618127tkiv2000lu6.jpg to http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/4373/108374267618127tkiv2000lu6.jpg *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20120309192408/http://geo-army.ge/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=9&Itemid=9&lang=en to http://geo-army.ge/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=9&Itemid=9&lang=en *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20120306133108/http://marinecorps.mil.ph/c6_sniperdev.html to http://marinecorps.mil.ph/c6_sniperdev.html *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20100216043442/http://www.barrett.net:80/pdfs/Manual-95.pdf to http://www.barrett.net/pdfs/Manual-95.pdf When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 15:03, 27 October 2016 (UTC)
